definitions.definition: A monoclinic pyroxene mineral , a magnesium calcium silicate with the chemical formula Ca Mg Si 2 O 6 , found in igneous and metamorphic rocks .

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) A monoclinic pyroxene mineral , a magnesium calcium silicate with the chemical formula Ca Mg Si 2 O 6 , found in igneous and metamorphic rocks .
